page.title: 16THE B.B.C. IN WARE
page.content: The B.B.C. warehouse in Star Street is the central storage depot for the whole world.There are B.B.C. centres in most cities all around the country and in many countries around the world. There is{200,000 sq.ft.}of storage space and the warehouse holds 2,000 different kinds of product.These are sent by lorry all over the country and by 'plane from Heathrow all over the world. They keep a record of the amount of goods bought on their computer,a Data General 4000.Thirty eight people are employed at the warehouse. The warehouse was responsible for distributing the goody bags which contain information about this{ {Domesday Project.}
